Vacaville.Rancho Tolenas:
Rancho Tolenas was a 13,316-acre (53.89 km2) Mexican land grant in present-day Solano County and Napa County, California given in 1840 by Governor Juan B. Alvarado to José Francisco Armijo. The grant was north east of present-day Fairfield and was bounded on the south by Rancho Suisun.
